custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on the More menu item
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to the More Menu with the title in the top header

More when device set to English
Mas when device set to Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the More Menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a "Account" button
and tapping this button will take the user to the Account Settings view

custom_steps_separated.content: When a lite user is on the More section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a 'Subscribe to MLB Audio' upsell Menu item
and tapping will launch the Audio paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: When a paid user is on the More section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see a 'Subscribe to MLB Audio' upsell Menu item

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on a More Menu webview
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a loading spinner in the top right of the webview control header

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is in the Apps & Games section
and the user has an app from that section installed on the device
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see Open link to the right of the icon
and tapping the row will app switch to the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is in the Apps & Games section
and the user does not have an app from that section installed on the device
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the configurable text from downloadText param in the file
and tapping the row will app switch to the App Store

custom_steps_separated.content: When the a More Menu item is set to phone: true
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the More menu item on iPhone

custom_steps_separated.content: When the a More Menu item is set to phone: false
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see the More menu item on iPhone

custom_steps_separated.content: When the a More Menu item is set to tablet: true
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the More menu item on iPad

custom_steps_separated.content: When the a More Menu item is set to tablet: false
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see the More menu item on iPad

custom_steps_separated.content: When the a More Menu item is set to lite: true
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a lite user will see the More menu item

custom_steps_separated.content: When the a More Menu item is set to lite: false
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a lite user will not see the More menu item

custom_steps_separated.content: When the a More Menu item is set to paid: true
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a paid user will see the More menu item

custom_steps_separated.content: When the a More Menu item is set to paid: false
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a paid user will not see the More menu item

custom_steps_separated.content: When a More menu item is set to webView: "0"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the item will open in a webview with no controls

custom_steps_separated.content: When a More menu item is set to webView: "1"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the item will open in a webview with webview controls (no refresh control)

custom_steps_separated.content: When a More menu item is set to webView: "2"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the item will open in a webview with webview controls (all controls)

custom_steps_separated.content: When a More menu item is set to webView: "3"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be prompted to leave At Bat
and if the user taps Yes the webview will open in an external Safari browser

custom_steps_separated.content: When a More menu item is set to webView: "4"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the item will open in the SFSafariViewController controller

https://developer.apple.com/documentation/safariservices/sfsafariviewcontroller

title: General -> More -> English
custom_steps: When a user taps on the More menu item
custom_expected:
Then the user is taken to the More Menu with the title in the top header

More when device set to English

title: General -> More -> Spanish
custom_preconds: When a user taps on the More menu item
custom_steps:
Then the user is taken to the More Menu with the title in the top header
Mas when device set to Spanish

title: General -> User Taps More Menu Item->English
custom_steps: Given a user taps on the More menu item
custom_expected:
Then Then the user is taken to the More Menu with the title in the top header

More when device set to English

title: General -> User Taps More Menu Item-> Device set to Spanish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I have the MLB at-bat app installed on my iOS device
AND my device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on `Más` link from the bottom
custom_expected:
Then I should be taken to the "More" menu page in Spanish
AND I should see Más as the page title on top of the page

title: General -> User is on "More Menu" -> User Taps "Account" Button
custom_steps:
Given the user is on the more menu
and sees the "account" button
When the user taps the "account" button
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the Account Settings view

title: General -> Lite User -> More Section
custom_preconds:
* App is installed 
GIVEN I am a non-paid user
AND I have the MLB at-bat app installed
AND
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on the `More` menu
custom_expected:
THEN I will be brought to the more menu page
AND I will see a 'Subscribe to MLB Audio' upsell Menu item
AND tapping on 'Subscribe to MLB Audio' will launch the Audio paywall

title: General ->Paid User -> More Section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has the MLB at-bat app installed
AND the user is a paid user
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the more menu
AND the user lands on the more menu
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see a 'Subscribe to MLB Audio' upsell Menu item

title: General -> User Taps More Menu Item-> User Lands in More Menu-> User taps Web-view Item
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB at-bat app is installed
AND the user taps on the More menu item
AND the More menu opens
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a web-view item (starting lineups for example)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a loading bar above the web-view control header 
AND the associated link will open in web-view within the app

title: General -> User On More Menu -> User Taps Icon From Apps and Games Section
custom_preconds:
* User is logged in
* User is in the more menu 
* User has an app from the Apps/Games section already installed
custom_steps:
Given the user is in the more menu and scrolls down to "Apps & Games" 
And the app has a red "open" text to the right of it
When the user clicks the app
custom_expected:
Then the user will see Open link to the right of the icon
and tapping the row will app switch to the app

title: General -> User On More Menu -> User Taps Icon From Apps and Games Section ->  User Does Not Have App from Apps & Games
custom_preconds:
* User is logged in
* User is in More Menu
* User DOES not have another app installed from Apps & Games
custom_steps:
Given the user is in the more menu and scrolls down to "Apps & Games"
And the app has a red "free" text to the right of it
When the user clicks the app
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the app store for download

title: A user will see items configured with app navigation config
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the iOS app
AND I have a favorite team set, the NYY  # can be any team
AND I have all the items set to visible from the app-nav tool
custom_steps:
WHEN I relaunch the app 
AND I look at the tab bar at the bottom of the screen
custom_expected:
THEN I should see "NYY" icon tab at the bottom of the menu
AND I should see "Scores" tab at the bottom of the menu
AND I should see a couple of more items on the tab bar 
AND I should see 'More' menu options

title: A user will see the configured items in More menu only
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the iOS app
AND I have a section in the More menu called "Testing-123" in the app-nav config menu
AND I have a section in the More menu called "PS'22" in the app-nav config menu
custom_steps:
WHEN I relaunch the app 
AND I disable the visibility on iOS for "Testing-123" in the app-nav menu
AND I disable the visibility on iOS for "PS'22" in the app-nav menu
AND I tap on "More" menu on the app
custom_expected:
THEN I should not see "Testing-123" item on the More menu list
AND I should not see "PS'22" item on the More menu list

title: A user will not see "Scores" when 'Scoreboard' is not visible in the app-nav config
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the iOS app
AND I have a favorite team set, the NYY # can be any team
AND the "Scores" and "Team Page" have been disabled for users using app-navigation config by unchecking the "visible" checkbox
custom_steps:
WHEN I relaunch the app 
AND I look at the tab bar at the bottom of the screen
custom_expected:
THEN I should not see "Scores" tab at the bottom of the menu
AND I should not see "NYY" icon tab at the bottom of the menu
AND I should see other menu items
